name: Masquerade Tattoo
description: This tattoo appears on your skin as whatever you desire. As a Bonus Action, you can shape the tattoo into any color or pattern and move it to any area of your skin. Whatever form it takes, it is always obviously a tattoo. It can range in size from no smaller than a copper piece to an intricate work of art that covers all your skin. As a Magic action, you can use the tattoo to cast Disguise Self (DC 13 to discern the disguise). Once the spell is cast from the tattoo, it can't be cast from the tattoo again until the next dawn.

effects.name: Shape Tattoo
effects.description: As a Bonus Action, change the tattoo's color, pattern, and location on your skin.

effects.name: Disguise Self
effects.description: Cast Disguise Self (DC 13). Once used, can't be cast again until the next dawn.
